trans-unit.source: Creates an alias for instantiate command with a certain set of arguments.
trans-unit.target: Creates an alias for instantiate command with a certain set of arguments.

trans-unit.source: Displays defined aliases.
trans-unit.target: Displays defined aliases.

trans-unit.source: Creates or displays defined aliases.
trans-unit.target: Creates or displays defined aliases.

trans-unit.source: NuGet package ID or path to folder or NuGet package to install. To install the NuGet package of certain version, use <package ID>::<version>.
trans-unit.target: NuGet package ID or path to folder or NuGet package to install. To install the NuGet package of certain version, use <package ID>::<version>.

trans-unit.source: Installs a template package.
trans-unit.target: Installs a template package.

trans-unit.source: A short name of the template to create.
trans-unit.target: A short name of the template to create.

trans-unit.source: Template specific options to use.
trans-unit.target: Template specific options to use.

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a template with given short name.
trans-unit.target: Instantiates a template with given short name.

trans-unit.source: Checks the currently installed template packages for updates.
trans-unit.target: Checks the currently installed template packages for updates.

trans-unit.source: If specified, only the templates matching the name will be shown.
trans-unit.target: If specified, only the templates matching the name will be shown.

trans-unit.source: Lists templates containing the specified template name. If no name is specified, lists all templates.
trans-unit.target: Lists templates containing the specified template name. If no name is specified, lists all templates.

trans-unit.source: Template Instantiation Commands for .NET CLI.
trans-unit.target: Template Instantiation Commands for .NET CLI.

trans-unit.source: If specified, only the templates matching the name will be shown.
trans-unit.target: If specified, only the templates matching the name will be shown.

trans-unit.source: Searches for the templates on NuGet.org.
trans-unit.target: Searches for the templates on NuGet.org.

trans-unit.source: NuGet package ID (without version) or path to folder to uninstall. If command is specified without the argument, it lists all the template packages installed.
trans-unit.target: NuGet package ID (without version) or path to folder to uninstall. If command is specified without the argument, it lists all the template packages installed.

trans-unit.source: Uninstalls a template package.
trans-unit.target: Uninstalls a template package.

trans-unit.source: Checks the currently installed template packages for update, and install the updates.
trans-unit.target: Checks the currently installed template packages for update, and install the updates.

trans-unit.source: Only check for updates and display the template packages to be updated without applying update.
trans-unit.target: Only check for updates and display the template packages to be updated without applying update.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a NuGet source to use during install.
trans-unit.target: Specifies a NuGet source to use during install.

trans-unit.source: Filters the templates based on the template author.
trans-unit.target: Filters the templates based on the template author.

trans-unit.source: Filters the templates based on baseline defined in the template.
trans-unit.target: Filters the templates based on baseline defined in the template.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the columns to display in the output.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the columns to display in the output.

trans-unit.source: Display all columns in the output.
trans-unit.target: Display all columns in the output.

trans-unit.source: Allows to pause execution in order to attach to the process for debug purposes.
trans-unit.target: Allows to pause execution in order to attach to the process for debug purposes.

trans-unit.source: Sets custom settings location.
trans-unit.target: Sets custom settings location.

trans-unit.source: If specified, removes the template cache prior to command execution.
trans-unit.target: If specified, removes the template cache prior to command execution.

trans-unit.source: If specified, resets the settings prior to command execution.
trans-unit.target: If specified, resets the settings prior to command execution.

trans-unit.source: If specified, shows the template engine config prior to command execution.
trans-unit.target: If specified, shows the template engine config prior to command execution.

trans-unit.source: If specified, the settings will be not preserved on file system.
trans-unit.target: If specified, the settings will be not preserved on file system.

trans-unit.source: Allows the command to stop and wait for user input or action (for example to complete authentication).
trans-unit.target: Allows the command to stop and wait for user input or action (for example to complete authentication).

trans-unit.source: Filters templates based on language.
trans-unit.target: Filters templates based on language.

trans-unit.source: Location to place the generated output.
trans-unit.target: Location to place the generated output.

trans-unit.source: Filters the templates based on NuGet package ID.
trans-unit.target: Filters the templates based on NuGet package ID.

trans-unit.source: Filters the templates based on the tag.
trans-unit.target: Filters the templates based on the tag.

trans-unit.source: Filters templates based on available types. Predefined values are "project" and "item".
trans-unit.target: Filters templates based on available types. Predefined values are "project" and "item".
trans-unit.note: project and item should not be translated

trans-unit.source: Specifies if post action scripts should run.
trans-unit.target: Specifies if post action scripts should run.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the baseline to instantiate.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the baseline to instantiate.

trans-unit.source: Displays a summary of what would happen if the given command line were run if it would result in a template creation.
trans-unit.target: Displays a summary of what would happen if the given command line were run if it would result in a template creation.

trans-unit.source: Forces content to be generated even if it would change existing files.
trans-unit.target: Forces content to be generated even if it would change existing files.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the template language to instantiate.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the template language to instantiate.

trans-unit.source: The name for the output being created. If no name is specified, the name of the output directory is used.
trans-unit.target: The name for the output being created. If no name is specified, the name of the output directory is used.

trans-unit.source: Disables checking for the template package updates when instantiating a template.
trans-unit.target: Disables checking for the template package updates when instantiating a template.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the template type to instantiate.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the template type to instantiate.
